title: How to Marry Carter in Harvest Moon DS Cute

steps.headline: Unlock his black heart event.
steps.description: Go to the excavation site from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM on any day other than Tuesday, and Carter can have any heart color. Have the first mine open. When Carter brags that the necklace he wears was found at this very site, tell him it is cool.

steps.headline: Unlock his purple heart event.
steps.description: Go to the waterfall area from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM on a sunny day, and Carter must have at least a purple heart color. Here, Carter will explain to you that he stands in the sun and just sunbathes to get his energy. He feels that the sun is indispensable and asks if you feel the same way. Say that it feels good.

steps.headline: Unlock his blue heart event.
steps.description: Go to the excavation site from 11:00 AM to 2:00 PM on any day other than Tuesday, and Carter must have at least a blue heart color. Flora, your rival for Carter, has already made some curry rice for lunch, which he doesn't like. Carter lies and says he has already promised to go to lunch with you. He pleads for you to go along with the façade. Agree to do so.

steps.headline: When Carter has a green heart color, just keep giving him gifts.
Unlock his yellow heart event.
steps.description: Go to Carter and Flora's tent from 6:20 PM to 10:00 PM on a sunny day but not on Monday or Tuesday, and Carter must have a yellow heart color. Carter will ask you if you would like to go and have a drink with him. Say that you will go. Eventually, when you and Carter have drunk several drinks, he will realize that he has drunk too much and suggests that the two of you go somewhere else. You agree and the two of you go to the beach.

steps.headline: Follow the instructions at Get Married in Harvest Moon DS Cute for more information.
When Carter has a red heart color, you can propose and get married.

text: Unlock his black heart event. Go to the excavation site from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM on any day other than Tuesday, and Carter can have any heart color. Have the first mine open. When Carter brags that the necklace he wears was found at this very site, tell him it is cool. Unlock his purple heart event. Go to the waterfall area from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM on a sunny day, and Carter must have at least a purple heart color. Here, Carter will explain to you that he stands in the sun and just sunbathes to get his energy. He feels that the sun is indispensable and asks if you feel the same way. Say that it feels good. Unlock his blue heart event. Go to the excavation site from 11:00 AM to 2:00 PM on any day other than Tuesday, and Carter must have at least a blue heart color. Flora, your rival for Carter, has already made some curry rice for lunch, which he doesn't like. Carter lies and says he has already promised to go to lunch with you. He pleads for you to go along with the façade. Agree to do so. When Carter has a green heart color, just keep giving him gifts.  Unlock his yellow heart event. Go to Carter and Flora's tent from 6:20 PM to 10:00 PM on a sunny day but not on Monday or Tuesday, and Carter must have a yellow heart color. Carter will ask you if you would like to go and have a drink with him. Say that you will go. Eventually, when you and Carter have drunk several drinks, he will realize that he has drunk too much and suggests that the two of you go somewhere else. You agree and the two of you go to the beach. Follow the instructions at Get Married in Harvest Moon DS Cute for more information.  When Carter has a red heart color, you can propose and get married.
